## SceneNode.findNodeById() method

Finds a scene node by its persistent ID.

**Signature:**

```typescript
findNodeById<T extends SceneNode>(id: string): T;
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description

string


</td><td>

Persistent identifier to match against `SceneNode.persistentId`<!-- -->.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

T

The first matching node, or `null` if not found.
